name: Volkl Mantra Junior Skis - Youths
description: Sporty meets floaty in the Mantra Junior. Using materials tuned for young skiers, these boards balance great float with all-mountain performance. The result is a lively ski that your shredder can ride for another season of best-day-evers.Full Sensor wood core puts harder wood at the binding area and lighter wood everywhere else.Camber profile keeps the ski responsive, lively and stable for young skiers.Titanium layer boosts damping to reduce chatter on firm terrain.Combination tip and tail rocker make it turn-friendly and allow for a stiffer flex set-up.Small turning radius makes initiating turns easier is a variety of conditions.Recommended for use with Marker rec bindings.
